name: Neuroscience 2024
content: The Society for Neuroscience is the world’s largest organization of scientists and physicians devoted to understanding the brain and the nervous system. Each year, scientists from around the world congregate to discover new ideas, share their research, and experience the best the field has to offer. Attend so you can: present research, network with scientists, attend session and events, and browse the exhibit hall. Join the nearly half a million neuroscientists from around the world who have propelled their careers by presenting an abstract at an SfN annual meeting — the premier global neuroscience event.
